description: The Dark Tide, a name that has disappeared from the ancient Wallis Continent for centuries, has returned to haunt its people. A group of ordinary people, whose destinies have been woven together due to various reasons, are unwittingly dragged into a crisis that has swept across the entire continent. After a series of events, their confusion turns into bravery as they face the irony of fate. But one thing never changes—their relentless pursuit of the truth. They are not fearless heroes. At times, they would feel frightened and lost as they could lose their lives at any moment. However, with their companions' trust, and by leveraging their own unique skills and talents, they will reach the end of their journey and find their tranquility from within…>
